title: ULTRA RARE! 1887 Philadelphia Athletics Kalamazoo Bats N690-1 Cabinet SOLD
author: sporteq

posts.post_title: ULTRA RARE! 1887 Philadelphia Athletics Kalamazoo Bats N690-1 Cabinet SOLD
posts.post_content:
Pretty rare maybe just a handful of these cabinets to go around. I believe 6 teams are included in the set. Cabinet looks to be trimmed or worn over time. 6.25" x 4.25" The Detroit copy sold for $30,000.00

Looking for serious offers.. message me.

Thanks for looking!
